key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: Show the line number of each item in the source tree.

key.name: load-remote-files
key.description: Download remote files into a temporary file for parsing the symbols.

key.name: expand-rows
key.description: Expand the entire source tree when initially loaded.

key.name: sort-list
key.description: Sorts the list of symbols alphabetically rather than by where they occur in the source file.

key.name: ctags-executable
key.description: Specifies the executable path for Exuberant Ctags.
